PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-10592022-10-07,  ECCC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Minister of the Environment to Enter into Environmental Occurrences Notification Agreements with the Governments of Ontario, Manitoba, British Columbia, Saskatchewan, Alberta and Yukon
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of the Environment to ENTER INTO ENVIRONMENTAL OCCURRENCES NOTIFICATION AGREEMENTS between the Government of Canada and the Governments of Ontario, Manitoba, British Columbia, Saskatchewan, Alberta and Yukon for the period commencing on March 25, 2021 and ending on March 24, 2026 in order to enable a streamlined notification system for persons required to notify provincial or territorial and federal governments of environmental occurrences.
AttachmentsAttachment
